opt.name: gzerosfunction
opt.description: name of the zero derivatives function (default: g_zeros).

opt.name: gradprefix
opt.description: Prefix for gradient variables (default: g_).

opt.name: hessprefix
opt.description: Prefix for hessian variables (default: h_).

opt.name: funcprefix
opt.description: Prefix for augmented functions (default: g_).

opt.name: exportcgvcg
opt.description: Export the call graph in VCG format (specify a file name).

opt.name: exportcgsimp
opt.description: Export the call graph in text form (specify a file name).

opt.name: exportcgtxt
opt.description: Export the call graph in text form (specify a file name).

opt.name: exportcgvcg
opt.description: Export the variable dependecy graph graph in VCG format (specify a file name).

f.name: 2ndorderfwd
f.description: Differentiate the sourcecode two times.

f.name: secondorderfwd
f.description: Differentiate the sourcecode two times.

f.name: nocanonicalize
f.description: Do not canonicalize nested expressions.

f.name: noAD
f.description: Do not apply AD, only optimizations will be applied to the MATLAB program.

f.name: noforwardvarresolv
f.description: Don't bind vars that are referenced before definition.

f.name: nobuiltins
f.description: Do not read any builtin-files.

f.name: nolocalmfiles
f.description: Do not bind pure statementfiles in the calling scope, but bind them in the root scope.

f.name: nooperoptim
f.description: Do not use optimised operators for operations with more than two operands.

f.name: nolocalcse
f.description: Switch off analysis to eliminate common subexpressions locally (Switches off globalcse, too).

f.name: noglobalcse
f.description: Switch off global analysis to eliminate common sub-expression (default).

f.name: globalcse
f.description: Switch on global analysis to eliminate common sub-expression.

f.name: noloopsaving
f.description: Do not insert the loopsaving-functions ls_*.

f.name: nooverwrtchk
f.description: Do not check for and rewrite overwriting of variables.

f.name: noscalarfolding
f.description: Deactivate all scalar folding.

f.name: noprescalarfolding
f.description: Deactivate scalar folding before augmenation.

f.name: nopostscalarfolding
f.description: Deactivate scalar folding after augmenation.

f.name: noconstfoldmult0
f.description: Do not fold products with one factor zero, using 0*x=0.

f.name: nonargsupport
f.description: Do not generate mapping arrays for nargin/nargout.

f.name: notmpclear
f.description: Do not generate a clear statement to deallocate temporary objects.

f.name: nosigensure
f.description: Stop ensuring that signatures are compatible during calls of functions.

f.name: diffifcond
f.description: Differentiate the conditions of if/elseif-clauses.

f.name: noforwardvarsubs
f.description: Suppress forward variable substitution.

f.name: nouservarforsubs
f.description: Do not apply forward substitution on user-defined variables.

f.name: nobracketsopt
f.description: Do not try to remove unneeded parentheses from the output.

opt.name: a-zeros-function
opt.description: Name of the zero adjoint function.

opt.name: activityAnalysis
opt.description: Controls if-then-else.

opt.name: adimat-function-prefix
opt.description: Prefix for derivative functions.

opt.name: adjoint-reductions
opt.description: Whether to use adjred wrapper functions in adjoint code.

opt.name: adjoint-reshapes
opt.description: Whether to use adjreshape wrapper functions in adjoint code.

opt.name: allow-array-growth
opt.description: Whether the size of an array being assigned to is allowed to change.

opt.name: avoid-vararg-functions
opt.description: Whether to use push/pop/a_zeros functions without varargin.

opt.name: comment-char
opt.description: Comment start character

opt.name: comment-spacer
opt.description: Space to insert after comment start character

opt.name: comment-start
opt.description: Comment start text

opt.name: fm
opt.description: Controls if-then-else.

opt.name: fmmode
opt.description: Controls if-then-else.

opt.name: forward-deriv-function-prefix
opt.description: the prefix for forward-ad derivative variables

opt.name: forward-deriv-variable-prefix
opt.description: the prefix for forward-ad derivative variables

opt.name: from
opt.description: The name of the identifier to rename.

opt.name: ind-to-subs-deep
opt.description: Whether to convert nested index expressions deeply or just the outermost (array) index layer.

opt.name: indent-unit
opt.description: Indentation unit

opt.name: input-file-name
opt.description: For informational purposes only.

opt.name: no-missing-adjoint-args
opt.description: Whether to conditionally initialize adjoints of output parameters to zero.

opt.name: nocanonicalize
opt.description: Controls if-then-else.

opt.name: output-directory
opt.description: Only used when output-mode=split-all.

opt.name: output-file-path
opt.description: For informational purposes only.

opt.name: output-file-prefix
opt.description: Only used when output-mode=split-all.

opt.name: output-mode
opt.description: Set to split-all for one file per function. Otherwise all functions go to "stdout", or the file given with option -o.

opt.name: parallel
opt.description: Whether to use parfor loops over derivatives.

opt.name: parallel-function-prefix
opt.description: Prefix for parallel derivative functions.

opt.name: prefix
opt.description: the prefix for both derivative variables and functions

opt.name: print-stack-info
opt.description: Insert code printing the current size of the stack. 1: call info function between forward and reverse sweep. 2: call info function on entering and leaving each function.

opt.name: rec-prefix
opt.description: the prefix for the recording (forward) sweep version of a differentiated function

opt.name: ret-prefix
opt.description: the prefix for the return sweep version of a differentiated function

opt.name: rev-prefix
opt.description: the prefix for the adjoint (recording + return) version of a differentiated function

opt.name: show-banner
opt.description: Insert transformation date into transformed file

opt.name: show-disclaimer
opt.description: Insert disclaimer into transformed file

opt.name: show-step-ids
opt.description: Show transformation step ids

opt.name: show-step-params
opt.description: Show transformation step parameters

opt.name: show-steps
opt.description: Show transformation steps

opt.name: source-line-numbers
opt.description: Include source line numbers in stmt. labels if set to 1.

opt.name: spook
opt.description: codes anarchy Whitehouse Majic defense information warfare Tamil Tigers afsatcom Jet Taiwan insurgency Secure Border Initiative Facility Rule Psix Help Federal Aviation Administration

opt.name: stack-info-function
opt.description: Name of the info function to be called when print-stack-info > 0.

opt.name: subsref-function-prefix
opt.description: Prefix for derivative functions.

opt.name: tmp-mode
opt.description: How to name temporary variables.

opt.name: tmp-prefix
opt.description: Prefix of temporary variables.

opt.name: tmpMode
opt.description: Controls if-then-else.

opt.name: to
opt.description: The name the identifier shall be renamed to.

opt.name: use-adjsum
opt.description: Whether to use adjsum function for summing adjoints.

opt.name: use-push-index
opt.description: Whether to allow dynamic resize in subsasgn.

opt.name: use-subsasgn
opt.description: Whether to use calls to subsasgn (needed with structures and in this case (FIXME: link)). Turned on if there is an active struct-ref in the code.

opt.name: use-subsref
opt.description: Whether to use calls to subsref (needed with structures and in this case (FIXME: link)). Turned on if parameter use-subsasgn is on.

opt.name: well-behaved
opt.description: Whether the code is well-behaved: Trigger some optimisations.
